infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Lomito needs your location to show animal welfare cases near you and to automatically detect your jurisdiction when submitting a report.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Lomito needs access to your camera to take photos of animal welfare issues when creating a report.
